channel.title: Need help with interface [PI]

item.title: Need help with interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RuneForceGame RuneForceGame
item.description:
@RuneForceGame wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:545135”]Change your GWD interface code to this:

[code=java]
public static void godWars(TextDrawingArea[] tda) {
RSInterface rsinterface = addTabInterface(16210);
addText(16211, “God Wars”, tda, 0, 0xff9040, true, true);
addText(16212, “Total Killcount:”, tda, 0, 0xff9040, true, true);
addText(16216, “0”, tda, 0, 0x66FFFF, true, true);//armadyl

	rsinterface.children = new int[3];
	rsinterface.childX = new int[3];
	rsinterface.childY = new int[3];
	
	rsinterface.children[0] = 16211;
	rsinterface.childX[0] = -52+375+30;
	rsinterface.childY[0] = 7;
	rsinterface.children[1] = 16212;
	rsinterface.childX[1] = -52+375+30;
	rsinterface.childY[1] = 30;
	rsinterface.children[2] = 16216;
	rsinterface.childX[2] = -52+460+30;
	rsinterface.childY[2] = 31;

}[/code][/quote]
Tyy!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Change your GWD interface code to this:

[code=java]
public static void godWars(TextDrawingArea[] tda) {
RSInterface rsinterface = addTabInterface(16210);
addText(16211, “God Wars”, tda, 0, 0xff9040, true, true);
addText(16212, “Total Killcount:”, tda, 0, 0xff9040, true, true);
addText(16216, “0”, tda, 0, 0x66FFFF, true, true);//armadyl

	rsinterface.children = new int[3];
	rsinterface.childX = new int[3];
	rsinterface.childY = new int[3];
	
	rsinterface.children[0] = 16211;
	rsinterface.childX[0] = -52+375+30;
	rsinterface.childY[0] = 7;
	rsinterface.children[1] = 16212;
	rsinterface.childX[1] = -52+375+30;
	rsinterface.childY[1] = 30;
	rsinterface.children[2] = 16216;
	rsinterface.childX[2] = -52+460+30;
	rsinterface.childY[2] = 31;

}[/code]

item.title: Need help with interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RuneForceGame RuneForceGame
item.description:
@RuneForceGame wrote:

I just added a godwars kc interface, does any1 know how i can delete this ?

My interface code:

public static void godWars(TextDrawingArea[] tda) { RSInterface rsinterface = addTabInterface(16210); addText(16211, "God Wars", tda, 0, 0xff9040, true, true); addText(16212, "Total Killcount:", tda, 0, 0xff9040, true, true); addText(16216, "0", tda, 0, 0x66FFFF, true, true);//armadyl rsinterface.scrollMax = 0; rsinterface.children = new int[9]; rsinterface.childX = new int[9]; rsinterface.childY = new int[9]; rsinterface.children[0] = 16211; rsinterface.childX[0] = -52+375+30; rsinterface.childY[0] = 7; rsinterface.children[1] = 16212; rsinterface.childX[1] = -52+375+30; rsinterface.childY[1] = 30; rsinterface.children[2] = 16213; rsinterface.childX[2] = -52+375+30; rsinterface.childY[2] = 44; rsinterface.children[3] = 16214; rsinterface.childX[3] = -52+375+30; rsinterface.childY[3] = 58; rsinterface.children[4] = 16215; rsinterface.childX[4] = -52+375+30; rsinterface.childY[4] = 73; rsinterface.children[5] = 16216; rsinterface.childX[5] = -52+460+60; rsinterface.childY[5] = 31; rsinterface.children[6] = 16217; rsinterface.childX[6] = -52+460+60; rsinterface.childY[6] = 45; rsinterface.children[7] = 16218; rsinterface.childX[7] = -52+460+60; rsinterface.childY[7] = 59; rsinterface.children[8] = 16219; rsinterface.childX[8] = -52+460+60; rsinterface.childY[8] = 74; }
